content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1/2 fluid ounce pina colada mix" )

content.text: 0) In a mixing glass combine the rum, apricot brandy, fruit punch and pina colada mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the rum"@29:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "apricot brandy"@38:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "fruit punch"@54:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pina colada mix"@70:85 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a mixing glass"@6:20 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir to blend and serve over ice.
